input_text:
Job Title: Senior Duck Creek Developer

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, TEKsystems c/o Allegis Group, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

We are hiring a Duck Creek Developer to join our team on a hybrid basis.

Duties & Responsibilities:

 Lead a team responsible for overseeing deliveries, design, development, and deployment. Independently craft code for Agile stories of high complexity across diverse platforms. Work closely with the quality assurance team to contribute to test automation efforts. Tasks involving development and design for Policy development, encompassing Duck Creek Manuscripts, Inheritance modeling, User Admin setup, Skins configuration, XSLT transforms, and SQL Database queries and procedures. Identify, debug, and resolve high-complexity bugs or issues independently, pinpointing the root cause and implementing fixes. Adhere to development standards and proficiently present technical solutions during code reviews with fellow developers. Collaborate closely with technical resources to interpret and translate business requirements into solution designs. Actively engage in the analysis, configuration, and programming activities supporting our business systems. Develop the ability to collaborate across all organizational levels, effectively communicating and engaging with diverse teammates.

Additional Skills & Qualifications:

 Demonstrated 8 years of professional expertise in software development and/or software architecture. 5+ years of adeptness in Duck Creek Policy admin system, Author, Page builder, with a comprehensive understanding of underwriting, rating, insurance rules, -and forms; Experience with Duck Creek policy platform version 8.x is a plus. Exhibited 5+ years of proficiency in leading and managing intricate systems projects. Displayed 5+ years of hands-on experience using P&C insurance software applications. Effective written and verbal communication skills. Strong competency with MS Office Applications. Experience in leading Waterfall and Agile software delivery models. Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work in a team environment as well as independently. All candidates must have permanent work authorization in the United States.

About TEKsystems:

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law. Senior Duck Creek Developer

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
